comments_2.comment_text:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/gabrielwen>@gabrielwen</denchmark-link>
  Can you provide more context? Is this one of our CI clusters? How was this error produced?

comments_3.comment_text:
We have a job to update the healthcheck path to /healthz: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/blob/master/kubeflow/gcp/update_backend.sh#L38>https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/blob/master/kubeflow/gcp/update_backend.sh#L38</denchmark-link>
 
 And our Istio setup is assuming it's /healthz for routing and also jwt check excludes that.
 However, it seems that although that job finished without error, the health check path is still /
